invalidAvatar: Cannot load avatar. Is the user is not exists or avatar is default?
noteDescription: The notes provided by Seriumium are temporary notepads. This note is overwritten when another user adds a note with the same ID, and is not an endlessly valid note because it is deleted when update. Seriumium is not responsible for the contents of this note.
noteCreated: Your note was created without any risks! You can open your note with identificate of note created. The identificate of note created is **{identificate}**.
wonGame: You won, the dinner is the chicken!
loseGame: Lose the game, but game is not done.
serverSources: {users} users, {channels} channels, {roles} roles, {emojis} emojis are available on this server.

notSearched: There is no result matches with {object}.
requirementsInvalidToColored:
Cannot create colored roles for you.
Following is requirements; `'Ionics' role`, `'MANAGE_ROLES' permission`
invalidHexColor: Invalid hex code was received; Correction:`;colored #FFFFFF`
needSupports: Need additional supports about Seriumium? [goto support server]({link})
executeResult: Following is the result of executed of your request.
searchResult: Following is the result of searched of your request.
queryResult: Following is the result of queryed of your request.
noResult: The result of request was not found on this server.
invalidResult: Can't handle the result of your request local server queryed.
noResult_fromRemote: The result of request was not found on remote server which queryed.
invalidResult_fromRemote: The result from remote server which you requested was invalid.
emptyParameter: Received empty parameter from your request. Please confirm sending not empty request before submit.
invalidParameter: Received invalid parameter from your request. Please confirm you are using valid letters before submit.
longParameter: Received valid parameter from you request but size of parameter is too huge. Please confirm parameter size's maximum value is under then 45 or same.
writeError: Can't write data to local storage.
permissionError: Can't execute command because the permissions which you have is not enought to execute command that you want.
parseError_fromRemote: Can't parse received data from remote server.
readError_fromRemote: Can't read received data from remote server.
writeError_fromRemote: Can't write data to remote server.
permissionError_fromRemote: Can't attempt command on remote server because the permissions which you have is not enought to execute command that you want.
